flavor: "The name is Monica, or Spectrum if you're nasty."
name: Spectrum
text: Energy Transformation - Forced Response: After you change to this form, choose a facedown energy form upgrade → flip that card faceup to change to that energy form.

name: Monica Rambeau
text: Setup: Put all 3 energy form upgrades into play, facedown. Power Down - Forced Response: After you change to this form, turn all your energy upgrades facedown.

name: Gamma
text: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 ATK. Hero Response: After you change to this form, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Photon
text: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 THW. Hero Response: After you change to this form, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Pulsar
text: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 DEF. Hero Response: After you change to this form, heal 1 damage from Spectrum.

flavor: "I do whatever is right, whenever it needs to be done, and I don't care what anyone thinks."
name: Blue Marvel
text: Hero Response: After Blue Marvel enters play, change energy forms

flavor: "I can take the form of any type of energy I want."-Spectrum
name: Energy Duplication
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Energy Duplication → generate the printed resource on your faceup energy form upgrade.

flavor: "I wouldn't make me angry either." - Spectrum
name: Gamma Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Change to Gamma energy form and deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you were already in Gamma energy form, this attack gains overkill.

name: Photon Speed
text: Hero Action (thwart): Change to Photon energy form and remove 4 threat from a scheme. If you were already in Photon energy form, ignore crisis icon for this thwart.

name: Pulsar Shield
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When Spectrum defends, change to Pulsar energy form and ready Spectrum. If you were already in Pulsar energy form, she gains retaliate 1 until the end of the phase.

name: Speed of Light
text: Hero Action: Change energy forms and draw 1 card.

name: Captain America
text:
Toughness.
Reduce the cost to play Captain America by 1 for each [[avenger]] character you control.

name: Power Man
text: Power Man enters play with 2 chi counters on him. Action: Discard any number of chi counters from Power Man → he gets +2 ATK for each chi counter discarded this way until the end of the phase.

name: White Tiger
text: Response: After you play White Tiger from your hand, draw X cards (to a maximum of three), where X is equal to the villain's stage number. If the villain has no stage number, draw 1 card.

name: Kaluu
text: Response: After Kaluu enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event → add that event to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Mighty Avengers
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 Team per player.
If each of your characters has the [[Avenger]] trait, each ally you control gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

name: Mass Attack
text: Hero Action: Exhaust 3 allies you control that shares a Trait with your hero → deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the total ATK of those allies and your hero.

name: Band Together
text: This card generates [wild] for each ally you control (to a maximum of 3)

name: Blade
text: [star] Forced Response: After Blade thwarts or attacks, choose to either spend a [physical] resource from your hand or discard Blade.

name: Ready to Rumble
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you change form, discard this card → ready your hero.

name: Adam Warlock
text: Battle Mage - Action: Discard 1 card from your hand. Limit once per phase. If that card is: -Aggression: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. -Justice: Remove 2 threat from a scheme. -Protection: Heal 1 damage from an ally. -Leadership: Give a hero +1 THW, +1 ATK and +1 DEF this round.

name: Adam Warlock
text: Avatar of Life - During deck-building, your deck must include an equal number of cards from all 4 aspects. You cannot include more than 1 copy of any non-Adam Warlock card. Action: Discard a card from your hand → remove a status card from Adam Warlock.

name: Pip the Troll
text: Toughness. While Pip the Troll is in your hand, he gains "Interrupt: When a player is attacked, spend[energy][mental] resources → put Pip the Troll into play under that player's controller."

name: Soul World
text: Response: After your deck runs out of cards, place 1 soul counter here. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Soul World and remove 1 soul counter from it → heal all damage from your identity.

name: Karmic Staff
text: Resource: Exhaust Karmic Staff → generate a [wild] resource

name: Warlock's Cape
text: Hero Response: After you resolve Adam Warlock's "Battle Mage" ability, exhaust Warlock's Cape → ready Adam Warlock's

name: Cosmic Ward
text: Forced Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery card, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard it. Then, discard Cosmic Ward

name: Mystic Senses
text: Hero Response: After you resolve Adam Warlock's "Battle Mage" ability, draw 1 card.

name: Karmic Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck → deal 1 additional damage to that enemy for each different aspect discarded this way (Aggression, Justice, Leadership and Protection)

name: Cosmic Awareness
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck → remove 1 additional threat from that scheme for each different aspect discarded this way (Aggression, Justice, Leadership and Protection)

name: Quantum Magic
text: Action: Choose a card in your discard pile → add that card to your hand

name: Marvel Boy
text: Interrupt: When Marvel Boy attacks, spend a [physics] resource → this attack gains piercing and ranged

name: In-Betweener
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Magic Attack
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Mystic]] trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Choose an enemy and discard up to 5 cards from the top of your deck → deal 1 damage to that enemy for each card discarded this way.

name: Audacity
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, deal 1 damage to the villain.

name: Quasar
text: Response: After Quasar enters play, remove 1 threat from each scheme in play.

name: Living Tribunal
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Remove 2 threat from the main scheme and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Zone of Silence
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Mystic]] trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (thwart): Choose a scheme and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck → remove 1 threat from that scheme for each card discarded this way.

name: Determination
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, remove 1 threat from the main scheme.

name: Major Victory
text: Interrupt: When Major Victory is defeated, choose a friendly Guardian character → ready that character.

name: Eternity
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Draw 1 card and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Summoning Spell
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Mystic]] trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an ally → put that ally into play under your control.

name: Innovation
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from an ally you control.

name: Charlie-27
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness.

name: The Gardener
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from your identity and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Shield Spell
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Mystic]] trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, discard that many cards from the top of your deck → prevent all damage from this attack.

name: Preservation
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from your hero.

name: Martinex
text: Reduce the cost to play Martinex by 1 if your identity has the Guardian trait.

flavor: Cosmo and the Knowhere Corps do their best to prevent more Black Order forces from landing on the station, but they need help!
name: Secure the Landing Pad
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Flip this card over.

name: Cosmo
text: The first player gains control of Cosmo. Cosmo does not count against the ally limit. Forced Interrupt: When Cosmo leaves play, remove him from the game.

name: Security Breach
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 2. When Revealed: Each player places a random card from their hand facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.

flavor: Black Order soldiers run rampant through the city around Avengers Tower, threatening the heroes' favorite restaurant.
name: Save the Shawarma Place
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Each player shuffles 1 copy of Shawarma into their deck. Flip this card over.

name: Black Swan
text: Toughness. Victory 2. Black Swan engages the first player. Forced Response: After Black Swan engages you, discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: "Have any of you ever tried shawarma?" —Tony Stark
name: Shawarma

flavor: In order to defeat Thanos, you must deactivate his ship's many defenses.
name: Hack Sanctuary's Computer
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Each player searches their deck and discard pile for 1 card, adds it to their hand, and shuffles their deck. Flip this card over.

flavor: You've accidentally tripped Sanctuary's failsafe program!
name: Defensive Protocols
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 2. Forced Interrupt: When the player phase ends, place 1 crash counter here. If there are 2 crash counters here, each player adds 1 copy of the System Shock obligation card to their hand. Remove this card from the game.

name: System Shock
text: You cannot choose to discard this card from your hand. While this card is in your hand, it gains: "Alter-Ego Action: Spend a [mental] resource → remove this card from the game."

name: Find the Norn Stones
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme unless Hela has the [[Wounded]] trait. When Defeated: Each player puts a copy of the Norn Stone upgrade into play under their control on its setup side. Flip this card over.

flavor: You've rescued Odin, but Hela still holds his armor in a secure vault.
name: Retrieve Odin's Armor
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 1. Threat cannot be removed from this scheme unless the first player controls Odin. When Defeated: Heal all damage from Odin and flip him to his [[King]] side.

name: Norn Stone
text: Permanent. Setup. Your hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. Hero Action: Ready your hero. Flip this card over.

name: Norn Stone
text: Permanent. Your hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Norn Stone to heal 1 damage from your identity.

name: Summoned Back
text: Peril. Surge. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for your nemesis minion and put it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: Sif and the Warriors Three have been imprisoned by the usurper, Loki. They would be valuable allies if rescued!
name: Open the Dungeons
text: When Defeated: Each player chooses 1 [[Captive]] ally from the campaign set and puts it into play under their control. Flip this card over.

name: Jormungand
text: Attach to Loki. Loki gets +4[per_hero] hit points. Forced Interrupt: When Loki is defeated, remove this card from the game.

flavor: "Was ever a maiden faced with a problem such as this?"
name: Lady Sif
text: Action: Spend a [physical] resource → ready Lady Sif.

flavor: "Though I hold life most dear, I will answer Loki for what he has done."
name: Fandral
text: [star] When Fandral uses his basic THW, ignore any crisis icons ([crisis]) in play.

flavor: "Loki has gone too far this time. He must be ended."
name: Hogun
text: [star] Hogun's attacks gain piercing.

flavor: "The mighty Volstagg will right these wrongs!"
name: Volstagg
text: Retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.) Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
